Hi @maciekcc, I'm not sure I understand what you mean. You're saying that with future changes to this explanatory comment, people will modify one part and forget to modify the other affected parts? That problem should be handled by future code reviews.

On top of that, the current explanation had little value to me, as the "..." omitted the very part I was trying to understand. If the explanation had included these changes when I first looked at it, it would have been much easier to understand, and I expect that to be true for others as well.
